files.description: A script to demonstrate the functionality of a Calculator class with various arithmetic and list operations, including error handling.
files.main_purpose: To showcase the capabilities of the Calculator class through examples of arithmetic operations, list operations, and error handling.

functions.name: main
functions.description: Demonstrates various operations of the Calculator class, including arithmetic, list operations, and error handling.
functions.purpose: Serves as the entry point to execute and demonstrate the Calculator class functionality.

key_features: Demonstrates basic arithmetic operations (add, subtract, multiply, divide)
Handles errors such as division by zero, type errors, and empty lists
Performs list summation with support for mixed numeric types
